ygData.subject: RE: Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: ... pull Serrated Bone ... Thats an interesting approach.  I think I just might do that. I spend about 70% of my play time fooling around giving concerts
ygData.messageBody:
>Chances are, they're nice people who all have masks anyway and just want to
pull >Serrated Bone
>Dirks and they'll happily let you loot the mask if you entertain them.


Thats an interesting approach. I think I just might do that. I spend about
70% of my play time fooling around giving concerts (have like 23 pages of
songs so far and still growing from various aspects). I forgot that that is
a lore item so this might actually work. If not, it will be an intereting
journey into guk.
